title: GO SMS Pro Theme Muffin Shake
creator: Workshop Theme

extendedInfo.description: GO SMS Pro Theme Muffin Shake Theme works only with GO SMS Pro application, if you don't have it, download for free from Google Play.Theme is pink and blue and milky shake'u muffinkach. Muffins are those creamy chocolate muffins or cakes, to eat. In the background you can see red, orange - pink background. A master plan, a delicious milk-chocolate and coffee cocktail - strawberry vanilla shake. Shake with fresh whipped ice cream and white ice cream with strawberry gift. :). In the sides are air bubbles, thats adding splendor to the entire appearance. If you very like color pink and orange / red in your device. Those cakes make you love and loving and happiness.This theme is about cute and sweet milk shake, pink and red and very nice sweets. This free theme have a great beautiful wallpaper and icons. New cute skin for GO SMS Pro Theme = milk cocktail white, purple, violet theme is sweet and pink them designed specially for girls/girly style. Make you and your lover full of sweet about food or buttery bun.Make Your Android world a brighter pink, brilliant and stunning, love and happiness.If you like sweets cakes, sweets, candy bars or wafers and cakes theme we hope that you will be also love this pink, raspberry, ruby shake style.Everything has been designed specifically for people who love pink, orange, red and white colors. This applications helps You customization and personalization your GO SMS Pro with beautiful, pink wallpaper, fonts and icons. This theme is about cute and sweet white stars - pink and red.To apply the theme(also for GO Chat):1. Download this theme from Google Play for free2. Download GO SMS Pro for free3. Install and launch GO SMS app3. Press right to see options and press: theme4. Press "Installed" tab 5. Tap the cute sweet GO SMS Pro Theme Muffin ShakeSweet pink poppet, purple tailstock will captivate you! Beautiful colors, such as pink, ruddy, blushing, rose, rose. Sweet pink, crimson, red, orange and yellow color surely captivate you! Beautiful colors like rose-colored, ruddy, blushing, rose, rosy.It does not matter whether you are a man or a woman..., just try this nice theme, download and colorize your device with sweety pink, cherry, stars and rouge strawberry with foam.To change apperance settings about conversation list1. Press Menu 2. Press Advanced3. Press Appearance Settings.4. Press Conversation List CustomizationAnd now You can adjusted for each other, you can change:- Background in messages.- Displayed contact pictures.- Contact font.- Contact font color.- Time and message fonts.- Or restet this setting as to default.To change apperance settings about conversation style1. Press Menu 2. Press Advanced3. Press Appearance Settings.4. Press Conversation customizationAnd now You can adjusted for each other, you can change:Conversation style ( bubble setting or list style)- Background- Incoming font- Outgoing font- Hyperlink color in textIf you want to use avatar icon for any contact simply change it and the new image for each contacts are visible on conversation list and messages sms list.Disclaimer: To support making of our themes and releasing it for free, this application periodically presents advertisements in your notification bar. The permissions are for advertising. This app will add a few search access points on your device. If you do not want to use this new search page, you can either ignore it or delete it. Thank you.Check our other themes: GO Launcher EX Theme pink cuteGO SMS Pro Theme pink zebrasweet cats GO SMS PRO ThemeGO SMS Theme rose pink cute GO Launcher EX hearts ThemeGO SMS Theme blue butterflyCheck other our GOSMSPro Themes, GO Locker Themes, and GO Launcher EX, free themes.Themes are published all the time, so remember to check our developer account regularly.Style was created by WorkshopTheme

reviews.title: Comes with spammy ads!
reviews.comment: I downloaded this theme, because I really liked it. I\'ve had it for less than 24 hours and have gotten rid of it because it keeps spamming my notification bar with ads. The ads range from saving money on products to finding singles in my area. This theme isn\'t cute enough to make up for the annoyance of the ads.
reviews.author: Amber McCraw
